issues.detailed_explaination: The exception message in the test assertion does not match the expected behavior of the CrashController. This could lead to confusion if the exception message changes in the future, as the test would still pass despite the actual behavior being incorrect.
issues.suggestion: Update the assertion message to accurately reflect the expected message from the CrashController when an exception is triggered.
issues.severity_reason: While this issue does not cause the test to fail, it can lead to misleading results and maintenance challenges.
